articles.description: The former India opener lashed out at Sanju Samson after MI’s stunning win over RR in the IPL 2023. | Cricket
articles.content: "I only played two balls but I'm drained as if I have scored a hundred. A lot of thoughts are going around," Sanju Samson had said while reflecting on Rajasthan Royals' (RR) impressive win over Chenn… [+2289 chars]

articles.title: 'Go & conquer the world!' HUL MD Sanjiv Mehta's shout-out to Yashasvi Jaiswal, lauds his humble beginnings - The Economic Times
articles.description: Sanjiv Mehta, CEO of Hindustan Unilever Limited, praised Yashasvi Jaiswal's stunning century in the 1000th Indian Premier League match. The 21-year-old player opened the batting for Rajasthan Royals and scored his first IPL century in just 62 balls on Sunday'…

articles.title: As MS Dhoni 'Farewell Fever' Grips Fans, Stephen Fleming Gives Update On CSK Skipper's Future - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Chennai Super Kings coach Stephen Fleming confirmed that MS Dhoni hasn't indicated to the franchise that it is going to be his last season in the IPL.
articles.content: The 'farewell fever' has truly gripped Indian Premier League (IPL) fans this season, with people turning up in yellow wherever MS Dhoni has gone to play. Be it New Delhi or Kolkata, stadiums have bee… [+2727 chars]
